verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אֶֽל־ <WH413> [T'el-upon הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <WH5155> han-ne-chi-Lot, upon Nehiloth מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David אֲמָרַ֖י <WH561> 'a-ma-Rai to my words הַאֲזִ֥ינָה׀ <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בִּ֣ינָה <WH995> Bi-nah consider הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <WH1901> ha-Gi-gi. my meditation

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ <WH7181> hak-Shi-vah Hearken לְק֬וֹל <WH6963> le-Kol unto the voice שַׁוְעִ֗י <WH7773> shav-'I, of my cry מַלְכִּ֥י <WH4428> mal-Ki my King וֵאלֹהָ֑י <WH430> ve-lo-Hai; and my God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, to אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <WH6419> 'et-pal-Lal. for unto thee will I pray

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בֹּ֭קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker in the morning תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> tish-Ma' shalt thou hear קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> ko-Li; My voice בֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker in the morning אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <WH6186> 'e-'e-roch- will I direct לְ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ <WH6822> va-'a-tzap-Peh. [my prayer] unto thee and will look up

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo No אֵֽל־ <WH410> 'el- For thou [art] not a God חָפֵ֘ץ <WH2655> cha-Fetz that hath pleasure רֶ֥שַׁע׀ <WH7562> Re-sha' in wickedness אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo No יְגֻרְךָ֣ <WH1481> ye-gur-Cha dwell רָֽע׃ <WH7451> Ra'. neither shall evil

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> yit-yatz-tze-Vu shall not stand הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <WH1984> Hol-lim The foolish לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH2962> le-Ne-ged before עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha; in thy sight שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <WH8130> Ne-ta, thou hatest כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei all workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. of iniquity

תְּאַבֵּד֮ <WH6> te-'ab-Bed Thou shalt destroy דֹּבְרֵ֪י <WH1696> doe-Rei them that speak כָ֫זָ֥ב <WH3577> cha-Zav leasing אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- man דָּמִ֥ים <WH1818> da-Mim the bloody וּמִרְמָ֗ה <WH4820> u-mir-Mah, and deceitful יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב׀ <WH8581> ye-Ta-'Ev will abhor יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, by בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> be-Ro in the multitude חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> Chas-de-cha of thy mercy אָב֣וֹא <WH935> a-Vo But as for me I will come בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> vei-Te-cha; [into] thy house אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <WH7812> 'esh-ta-cha-Veh will I worship אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הֵֽיכַל־ <WH1964> hei-chal- temple קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> kod-she-cha toward thy holy בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3374> be-yir-'a-Te-cha. [and] in thy fear

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD נְחֵ֬נִי <WH5148> ne-Che-ni Lead בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-Te-cha, in thy righteousness לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <WH8324> shor-Rai; because of mine enemies; הֹושַׁר ho-shar כהַיְשַׁ֖ר <WH3474> hay-Shar direct קלְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai before my face דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH1870> dar-Ke-cha. make thy way

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֵ֪ין <WH369> 'ein There בְּפִ֡יהוּ <WH6310> be-Fi-hu in their mouth נְכוֹנָה֮ <WH3559> ne-cho-Nah For [there is] no faithfulness קִרְבָּ֪ם <WH7130> kir-Bam their inward הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <WH1942> hav-Vot part [is] very wickedness קֶֽבֶר־ <WH6913> ke-ver- sepulchre פָּת֥וּחַ <WH6605> pa-Tu-ach [is] an open גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <WH1627> ge-ro-Nam; their throat לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> le-sho-Nam, with their tongue יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <WH2505> ya-cha-Li-kun. they flatter

הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם׀ <WH816> ha-'a-shi-Mem Destroy אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, thou them O God יִפְּלוּ֮ <WH5307> yip-pe-Lu let them fall מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH4156> mi-mo-'a-Tzo-Tei-Hem by their own counsels בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> be-Ro in the multitude פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <WH6588> Pish-'ei-hem of their transgressions הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <WH5080> had-di-Che-mov; cast them out כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for מָ֥רוּ <WH4784> Ma-ru for they have rebelled בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <WH8055> ve-yis-me-Chu in thee rejoice כָל־ <WH3605> chol all ח֪וֹסֵי <WH2620> Cho-sei But let all those that put their trust בָ֡ךְ vach לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam let them ever יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ <WH7442> Ye-ran-ne-nu shout for joy וְתָסֵ֣ךְ <WH5526> ve-ta-Sech because thou defendest עָלֵ֑ימוֹ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-mov; and וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ <WH5970> ve-ya'-le-Tzu be joyful בְ֝ךָ֗ ve-cha, אֹהֲבֵ֥י <WH157> 'o-ha-Vei them let them also that love שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. thy name

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּה֮ <WH859> 'at-Tah who תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <WH1288> te-va-Rech wilt bless צַ֫דִּ֥יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik the righteous יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; For thou LORD כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <WH6793> katz-tzin-Nah, him as [with] a shield רָצ֥וֹן <WH7522> ra-Tzon with favour תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5849> ta'-te-Ren-nu. wilt thou compass
